sentences.en: Brazilians look gloomily forward to a New Year that even the president admits will be grey and cheerless.
sentences.cn: 展望新年，巴西人心情沮丧，甚至连总统都承认明年困难重重，不容乐观。

sentences.en: Breakfast will be a cheerless affair for the Prime Minister this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天的早餐会让首相感觉全然无味。
不高兴的,抑闷的; 忧愁的.

sentences.en: Cold and cheerless corridor, heavy suitcase, scattered station attendant.
sentences.cn: 冷清的过道 、 笨重的行李箱, 零散的车站值班人员.

sentences.en: It afforded her a little relief, of a dull and cheerless kind.
sentences.cn: 这使她感到几分宽慰, 不过这是一种索然无味而又凄然的宽慰罢了.

sentences.en: It was a wet and cheerless day yesterday.
It was the end of November and the day was very cheerless.
sentences.cn: 已经是十一月底了,天色十分阴暗.

sentences.en: Shortcoming Procedure is simple, therefore may appear and cheerless.
sentences.cn: 缺点程序简单, 所以会显得冷清.

sentences.en: The cheerless monotony was sometimes enlivened with a little innocent merriment.
sentences.cn: 有时候,一点儿天真的嬉戏会使阴郁单调的生活增添一点生气.

sentences.en: The cheerless surroundings had no effect on her.
sentences.cn: 令人泄气的环境对她毫无影响.

sentences.en: The day was grey and cheerless.
The land is cheerless and barren, arid as the Sahara.
sentences.cn: 这片土地荒凉而贫瘠, 干旱得一如撒哈拉.

sentences.en: The night - to - night duties can be hard and cheerless.
sentences.cn: 连续不断地上夜班是辛苦而乏味的.

sentences.en: These adjectives mean having a broodingly cheerless aspect or disposition.
sentences.cn: 这些形容词都指不高兴的性情.

sentences.en: They came back quiet and cheerless.
This is a cold cheerless place.
sentences.cn: 这是个寒冷、阴郁的地方。

trans.tran_cn: 沉闷的，无乐趣的，不快乐的，阴郁的
trans.tran_en: cheerless weather, places,or times make you feel sad, bored, or uncomfortable
